nodes.id: 邱学强

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任最高人民检察院副检察长、党组副书记，一级大检察官。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Procurator-General and Deputy Party Group Secretary of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, and a Grand Procurator of the First Rank.

nodes.id: 莘县

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省聊城市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Liaocheng City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 青海省广播电视大学

description.zh-cn: 位于中国青海省的一所广播电视大学。
description.en: A radio and television university located in Qinghai Province, China.

nodes.id: 中共中央党校

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的、专门培训党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的学校。
description.en: A school directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, specializing in training high- and middle-level party leaders and cadres in Marxist theory.

nodes.id: 中国共产党

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会
en: 16th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2002年至2007年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China from 2002 to 2007.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary inspection body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会
en: 17th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2007年至2012年间的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary inspection body of the Communist Party of China from 2007 to 2012.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会
en: 18th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2012年至2017年间的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary inspection body of the Communist Party of China from 2012 to 2017.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2017年至2022年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China from 2017 to 2022.

nodes.id: 最高人民检察院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高检察机关。
description.en: The highest procuratorial organ in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 一级大检察官

en: Grand Procurator of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国检察官的最高等级。
description.en: The highest rank for prosecutors in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 青海省人民检察院

description.en: The leading organ for political and legal affairs of the Communist Party of China in Qinghai Province.

description.en: The executive deputy leadership position of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 胡泽君

description.en: Chinese politician, former Auditor General of the National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 童建明

description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Party Group Secretary and Executive Deputy Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 邱学强接替胡泽君，担任中华人民共和国最高人民检察院常务副检察长。
description.en: Qiu Xueqiang succeeded Hu Zejun as the Executive Deputy Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 童建明接替邱学强，担任中华人民共和国最高人民检察院常务副检察长。
description.en: Tong Jianming succeeded Qiu Xueqiang as the Executive Deputy Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China.
